actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain the Olalla division of the Umpqua project, Oregon, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain the Olalla division of the Umpqua project, Oregon. Authorizes the appropriation of $21,442,000 for the purposes of such construction.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain the Olalla division of the Umpqua project, Oregon, and for other purposes.
